meanings.sent1: The cubebs in the garden are thriving in the warm climate.
meanings.sent2: I bought some cubebs from the market to add flavor to my dish.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cubebs refuse to spice up the party? They were feeling a bit shy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of cubebs, adding a hint of joy to the room.
meanings.sent5: The cubebs swayed gently in the breeze, their leaves shimmering in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The dried unripe berries of this plant, used as a spice.
meanings.sent1: The chef added cubebs to the curry for a unique flavor.
meanings.sent2: I love the aroma of cubebs when they are freshly ground.
meanings.sent3: The cubebs decided to have a dance party in the spice rack.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like cubebs, adding a touch of spice to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The cubebs released a burst of fragrance when crushed, filling the kitchen with a delightful scent.

meanings.sent1: I accidentally bit into a cubebs while eating my meal.
meanings.sent2: The cubebs added a kick of heat to the soup.
meanings.sent3: The cubebs rolled off the table and onto the floor, trying to escape the pepper grinder.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like cubebs in the sunlight, full of warmth and depth.
meanings.sent5: The cubebs popped in my mouth, releasing a burst of spicy flavor.
